text:
Interstate Transfer (Community-based Sentences) (Corresponding Laws) Notice 2022

I make the following notice under section 3(2) of the Interstate Transfer (Community-based Sentences) Act 2009 .

3 March 2022

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Corrections

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Interstate Transfer (Community-based Sentences) (Corresponding Laws) Notice 2022 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Corresponding laws
    The following are declared to be corresponding laws for the purposes of the Interstate Transfer (Community-based Sentences) Act 2009 :
            (a) the Community Based Sentences (Interstate Transfer) Act 2020 of Queensland;
            (b) the Community Based Sentences (Interstate Transfer) Act 2015 of South Australia.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 March 2022

This notice is administered in the Department of Justice.
